channel.title: zuluCrypt appears blank
channel.description:
Hi I'm new to the whole Whonix scene and I recently installed Whonix and got it to run. All the pre-installed programs work fine but I've an issue using zuluCrypt. zuluCrypt when opened appears blank, no function.
Apologize but I'm very lost on how to use the default encryption mounting tool.
Thank You
Edit: Here's the link of what I see when I open zuluCrypt ibb(dot)co(slash)99TV66F Change (dot) to . Change (slash) to /

item.title: zuluCrypt appears blank
item.dc:creator: newbiehelp
item.description:
The method suggested here works, I can get zuluCrypt running now

Read full topic

item.title: zuluCrypt appears blank
item.dc:creator: newbiehelp
item.description:
I appreciate the help. I’m glad that this error is not on my end, I thought I mess up something somewhere or I’m not doing something right.

Read full topic

item.title: zuluCrypt appears blank
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Maybe helpful:

sudo apt update
sudo apt install policykit-1-gnome

Reboot required.

Will be installed by default in next release.

Read full topic

item.title: zuluCrypt appears blank
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
newbiehelp:

zuluCrypt when opened appears blank, no function

confirmed.

zulucrypt cant be executed due to polkit issue, plain debian bullseye working good. cc @patrick
